home.title: vStats
home.subtitle: Minimalist and Aesthetic Server Monitoring
home.description: Go-powered, millisecond latency, one-click deployment. Real-time monitoring of CPU, memory, disk, network and other key metrics, supports multi-server management with modern UI design.

features.title: Core Features
features.subtitle: vStats focuses on providing the ultimate server monitoring experience, combining powerful features with minimalist design.

realtime.title: Real-time Monitoring
realtime.desc: Real-time system metrics via WebSocket, millisecond latency, second-level data refresh.

multiServer.title: Multi-Server Management
multiServer.desc: Monitor multiple servers simultaneously, centralized management, all at a glance.

modernUI.title: Modern Aesthetic UI
modernUI.desc: Glass morphism design, smooth interface, delicate animations, first-class visual experience.

oneClick.title: One-Click Deployment
oneClick.desc: Docker containers and automated scripts, deployment completed in seconds.

security.title: Security Authentication
security.desc: Built-in JWT authentication to protect your monitoring data and management interfaces.

comprehensive.title: Comprehensive Metrics
comprehensive.desc: Full display of core metrics including CPU, memory, disk I/O, network traffic, load, etc.

themes.title: Diverse Themes
themes.subtitle: Built-in multiple beautiful themes to meet your personalized needs.

sponsors.title: Sponsors
sponsors.subtitle: Thanks to the support of our partners

cli.title: vStats CLI
cli.subtitle: Powerful command-line interface for managing your vStats instances and agents.

fullControl.title: Full Control
fullControl.desc: Manage servers, view metrics, and configure alerts directly from your terminal.

easyInstall.title: Easy Install
easyInstall.desc: Simple one-line installation for all major operating systems.

automation.title: Automation
automation.desc: Scriptable output formats (JSON/YAML) for easy integration with your workflows.

cloud.title: vStats Cloud
cloud.subtitle: Hosted server monitoring solution, zero maintenance, unlimited scaling
cloud.comingSoonDesc: Thank you for your attention! We are working hard on vStats Cloud, please stay tuned.
cloud.waitingMessage: While waiting, you can try the self-hosted version first
cloud.noServers: No servers yet. Add your first server!
cloud.selectServer: Select a server to view details
cloud.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this server?
cloud.limitReached: Server limit reached. Upgrade to add more.

enterpriseSecurity.title: Enterprise Security
enterpriseSecurity.desc: Built-in SSO, audit logs, and role-based access control

globalEdge.title: Global Edge Network
globalEdge.desc: Monitor your infrastructure from 20+ regions worldwide

dataRetention.title: Long-term Data Retention
dataRetention.desc: Store historical monitoring data for up to 3 years

cloud.devMessage: üöÄ vStats Cloud is under development, please stay tuned!

docker.desc: One-click deployment with Docker, no manual dependency installation required

agent.title: Install Agent
agent.desc: After logging into Dashboard, go to Settings page to get installation command

footer.description: Minimalist and aesthetic server monitoring system. Driven by Go, millisecond latency, one-click deployment.
